div.p: A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter & minute book, p. 48, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p: I have the honor to inform you that the Trustees of the Royal Park have approved of the suggestions of the Brunswick Borough Council as contained in your letter of 18th Novbr. concerning the new gates necessary at the northern side of the Royal Park and the agent of the trustees Mr Alb. Le Souef is authorized to arrange with your council all details of these intended improvements.
